data.title: One Day in September Original 2000 U.S. One Sheet Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 2000 U.S. one sheet poster for the documentary film One Day in September directed by Kevin Macdonald with Michael Douglas / Ankie Spitzer / Jamal Al Gashey / Gerald Seymour.
